format_message(text)¶

Replace WECHANGE formatting language with Rocket.Chat formatting language: Rocket.Chat:

get(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Return users/channels as ZIP file (required by Rocket.Chat) see https://rocket.chat/docs/administrator-guides/import/csv/ :param request: :param args: :param kwargs: :return:

make_archive(file_list, archive, root)¶

‘fileList’ is a list of file names - full path each name ‘archive’ is the file name for the archive with a full path
